itemName: Enchanted Night Wyrm's Ring of Divine Suffering

uniqueAbilities.name: Marked for Death
uniqueAbilities.effect: Presents a list of all crawlers within map's range. Only crawlers with 100% health can be selected. Killing a marked crawler grants a permanent +1 stat point to the highest stat of the killed crawler. The +1 stat benefit increases by one for every three marks killed. Once a mark is set the user cannot heal until the marked crawler is killed.
uniqueAbilities.cooldown: 5 hours on most floors, no cooldown on the 6th floor, 15-minute cooldown on the 9th floor.

itemName: Enchanted Crown of the Sepsis Whore

uniqueAbilities.name: Sepsis Debuff
uniqueAbilities.effect: 15% chance to inflict the Sepsis debuff on all attacks.

specialWarning: Wearing this crown places the user in the royal line of succession for the Blood Sultanate on the ninth floor. Removing the crown does not remove this status. Royal members must slay the Sultan and all other royal family members before descending to the tenth floor.

uniqueAbilities.name: Desperado Club Access
uniqueAbilities.effect: Granted

uniqueAbilities.name: Naughty Boys Employment Agency Access
uniqueAbilities.effect: Granted

uniqueAbilities.name: Thrown Explosives
uniqueAbilities.effect: 50% range and accuracy for all thrown explosives

itemName: Enchanted Nipple Ring of the Defiler

uniqueAbilities.name: Religious Affiliation Detection
uniqueAbilities.effect: Instantly know the religious affiliation of all nearby mobs and crawlers.

uniqueAbilities.name: Shrine Destruction
uniqueAbilities.effect: Allows the destruction of church shrines without further ill effects from deities.

uniqueAbilities.name: Damage Boost
uniqueAbilities.effect: 25% damage against all clerics.

uniqueAbilities.name: Black Nimbus
uniqueAbilities.effect: Allows casting of Black Nimbus once an hour.

itemName: Enchanted Anklet of the Fallen Oak
Enchanted Auto Buckler of the Peach Pit

uniqueAbilities.name: Auto Buckler
uniqueAbilities.effect: Forms a metallic buckler on command.

uniqueAbilities.name: Shatter
uniqueAbilities.effect: 1.5% chance to disarm the opponent on attack.

uniqueAbilities.name: Disarmed Weapon Outcomes
uniqueAbilities.effect: 90% chance the item will drop to the ground, 5% chance the weapon will break, 5% chance the weapon will be transferred to your inventory

uniqueAbilities.name: Protective Shell
uniqueAbilities.effect: Allows casting of level 15 Protective Shell once every 30 hours.

uniqueAbilities.name: Tripper Spell
uniqueAbilities.effect: Allows casting of level 15 Tripper spell once every five hours.

uniqueAbilities.name: Remote Detonator
uniqueAbilities.effect: Allows remote-detonation of any explosive designated by the user.

itemName: Enchanted Obsidian Bracelet of the Raggle Rouser

uniqueAbilities.name: Fire Resistance
uniqueAbilities.effect: 20% Fire Resistance

uniqueAbilities.name: Fireball Spell
uniqueAbilities.effect: Allows casting of level 10 Fireball spell once every twenty minutes.

itemName: Enchanted Silver Bracelet of the Ab-solar

uniqueAbilities.name: Vampirism Protection
uniqueAbilities.effect: Protection against Vampirism.

uniqueAbilities.name: Lycanthropy Protection
uniqueAbilities.effect: Protection against Lycanthropy.

uniqueAbilities.name: Magical Damage
uniqueAbilities.effect: 25% Magical damage against all sapient undead.

itemName: Enchanted Toe Ring of the Leprous Bandit

uniqueAbilities.name: Sticky Feet
uniqueAbilities.effect: Temporarily walk barefoot on non-horizontal surfaces.

uniqueAbilities.name: Super Spreader
uniqueAbilities.effect: Spread an active debuff to one target.

uniqueAbilities.name: Poison Resistance
uniqueAbilities.effect: Wearer gains resistance to poison.

uniqueAbilities.name: Ice Resistance
uniqueAbilities.effect: Wearer gains resistance to ice-based attacks.

uniqueAbilities.name: Anti-Piercing Resistance
uniqueAbilities.effect: Adds anti-piercing resistance to all worn armor.

specialWarning: Nightgaunts may react negatively if they see you wearing this cloak.

uniqueAbilities.name: Melee Protection
uniqueAbilities.effect: Negates all melee-based damage debuffs such as Stun, Knockback, Disarm, and Out-of-Breath.
